thread.title: Here's The PlayStation Plus Lineup For February
thread.title_full: Here's The PlayStation Plus Lineup For February

author: Riley MacLeod
title: Here's The PlayStation Plus Lineup For February
text:
Go to permalink 
There’s a range of games in PlayStation Plus’ lineup for February , which drops on the 7th. I can’t not “aaww” at the LittleBigPlanet games, and though I wasn’t a huge fan of Not a Hero on PC, I might really enjoy blasting away at foul-mouthed pixel enemies from my couch. Advertisement 
As ever, these games are only “free” if you have an active PlayStation Plus membership. PlayStation 4
